div.script:
<% if(typeof cart != 'undefined') { var cartItems = cart.cartItems, cartQty = document.getElementById('mini-cart-qty'); /*update cart quantity*/ if(cartQty) {cartQty.innerHTML = (cart.totalQuantity < 100 ) ? cart.totalQuantity : '99+';} %>
<% if(cartItems.length > 0 || failedAdditionItems.length > 0) { %>
    <% render( this.renderFailedAdditions() ); render( this.renderLineItems() ); %>
<% if(cart.orderTotals) { %>
<% var reFree = /free/i, totals = [ {label: 'Subtotal', type: 'subtotal', prefix:'', className: 'subtotal'}, {label: 'Coupon Savings', type: 'couponSavings', prefix: '-', className: 'discount'}, {label: 'Promotional Savings', type: 'promotionalSavings', prefix: '-', className: 'discount', href: '/11407/static.html'}, {label: 'In-Store Credit', type: 'instoreCredit', prefix: '-'}, {label: 'Gift Cards', type: 'giftCardCredit', prefix: '-'}, {label: 'Club O Rewards', type: 'clubORedemptionAmount', prefix: '-', className: 'discount'}, {label: 'Shipping', type: 'shippingCharge', prefix: ''}, {label: 'Tax', type: 'tax', prefix: ''}, {label: 'Total', type: 'grandTotal', prefix: '', className: 'order-total'} ]; for(var i=0; i < totals.length; i++) { var item = totals[i], className; item.total = cart.orderTotals[item.type]; if(reFree.test(item.total)) { item.className = 'discount'; } className = (item.className) ? 'class="' + item.className + '"' : ''; if(item.total){ %>
><% render((item.href) ? ''+ item.label +'' : item.label); %>:
><% render(item.prefix + item.total); %>
<%} } %>
<% } else { %>
Subtotal: <%= cart.subtotal %>
<% } %> <% } else if (cartItems.length == 0) { %>

Your shopping cart is empty.

<% } %>
<% if(cartItems.length > 0) { %> Checkout Now <% } %> <% var jsonCart = {"apiUrl":"http://www.overstock.com//api/cart/cartLayer.json","editUrl":"http://www.overstock.com/cart?TID=CartLayer","enabled":true,"layerUsedForAdditions":false,"requestTimeoutInMillis":10000}; if(typeof jsonCart.editUrl != 'undefined') { %> Edit Cart <% } %>
<% } else { %>

We were unable to load the items in your cart. Please click here to view your items.

<% } %>

<% var classNames = ''; if(item.recentlyAdded) { classNames += ' added'; } if(item.warningMessages && item.warningMessages.length > 0) { classNames += ' has-warning'; } %> <% /*display a heading for all previous items only once, items with errors or warnings should be pushed to the top*/ if(!this.hasPreviouslyAddedHeading && !item.recentlyAdded && item.warningMessages.length == 0) { %>

  • Previously Added Items

    • <% this.hasPreviouslyAddedHeading = true;} %>
  • <% render( this.renderMessage(item) ); %>
    <%= item.productName %>
    ><%= item.undiscountedPrice %> <%= item.priceAfterSiteSalePercentOff %>
    Quantity: <%= item.quantity %> <% if(item.optionName) { %> Options: <%= item.optionName %> <% } %> <% if(item.termsAndConditionsMessages && item.termsAndConditionsMessages[0]) { %> <%= item.termsAndConditionsMessages[0].prelinkText %><%= item.termsAndConditionsMessages[0].linkText %> <% } %> <% render( this.renderItemWarranty(item) ); %>

• <% render( this.renderMessage(item) ); %>
    <%= item.productName %> <% if(item.optionName) { %> Options: <%= item.optionName %> <% } %>

<% var msgType = (item.errorMessages) ? 'errorMessages' : 'warningMessages'; if(item[msgType].length <= 0) { %> <% if(item.recentlyAdded) { %>

This Item Has Been Added to Your Shopping Cart

<% } %> <% } else { %>

<% for(var i=0; i < item[msgType].length; i++) { %> <% if(i === 0) { %> <%= item[msgType][i] %> <% continue; } %> <%= item[msgType][i] %> <% } %>

<% } %>

<% if(item.warrantyDetail) { %> <%= item.warrantyDetail.productName %>: <%= item.productName %> Remove Warranty <%= item.warrantyDetail.undiscountedPrice %> <% } else if (item.orderLevelWarrantyOptionId) { var warr = this.getOrderLevelWarrantOption(item.orderLevelWarrantyOptionId); if(warr) { %> <%= warr.productName %>: Includes all furniture items in this order. <% } %> <% } else if(item.coverageDescription) { %> <%= item.coverageDescription %> View details <% } %>
